original_text: But the goat, on which the lot fell to be the scapegoat, shall be presented alive before the Lord, to make an atonement with him, and to let him go for a scapegoat into the wilderness.
korean_text: 아사셀을 위하여 제비 뽑은 염소는 산 채로 여호와 앞에 두었다가 그것으로 속죄하고 아사셀을 위하여 광야로 보낼지니라

sentences.original_text: on which the lot fell to be the scapegoat
sentences.korean_translation: 제비 뽑혀 속죄 염소가 된 것은

sentences.original_text: shall be presented alive before the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 여호와 앞에 산 채로 드려질 것입니다

sentences.original_text: to make an atonement with him
and to let him go for a scapegoat
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것을 속죄 염소로 보내기 위해
